prompt: Translate this email to Turkish and keep the tone professional.
Summarize this long article into five key bullet points.
Proofread this draft and fix grammar issues.
Analyze this CSV and show top trends.
Scrape this product page and extract title, price, and stock status.
Track this product price daily and alert me when it drops.
Map this website and list all internal pages.
Extract B2B leads from these company pages.
Monitor this competitor blog weekly and report changes.
Review this pull request for bugs and security issues.
Write unit tests for this module.
Check dependency vulnerabilities in this project.
Generate a clean git commit message from current diff.
Create a changelog entry from these merged commits.
Add documentation for this API endpoint.
Assess this workload migration from on-prem to AWS cloud.
Review this Terraform plan and highlight risky changes.
Generate Kubernetes manifests for this Node.js service.
Play my focus playlist on Spotify.
What is the weather in Lisbon tomorrow?
Set up 1Password CLI and verify signin works.
Open a tmux session and run this long task in the background.
